MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 and LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in New Broughton, Caego, Minera, Bersham and the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:23AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:55AM on 24th February 2021
